description: Much of what you'll be doing in Mana and Artifice will require /b/manaweaving/b/. /b/Manaweaving/b/ is the process of drawing shapes into the air via a /b/Manaweaver's Wand/b/, this is used to power /b/Manaweaving Altars/b/, some /b/Rituals/b/, and /b/Cantrips/b/.
/6/If your having trouble drawing the patterns by hand you can use the radial menu to select a pattern to be drawn automatically./6/
There are three types of wand avalable to you. The /b/Improvised Manaweaver's Wand/b/, The /b/Vinteum Manaweaver's Wand/b/, and The /b/Chimerite Manaweaver's Wand/b/.

The /b/Improvised Manaweaver's Wand/b/ is the cheapest of the Manaweaving Wands, it only has enough durability for a couple patterns and we only recomend using it in the off chance you dont have access to your main wand.
/6/This recipe can be done with allmost any stick shaped object and any magical flower./6/
The /b/Vinteum Manaweaver's Wand/b/ has a higher durability
than The /b/Improvized Manaweaver's Wand/b/, and has the lowest /9/Mana/9/ cost when drawing patterns.

The /b/Chimerite Manaweaver's Wand/b/ is the most expensive out of all of the Manaweaving wands. It also has the highest /9/Mana/9/ cost out of all the wands. But it does not cost any durability to use. And in this pack it is locked behind /5/Teir 2/5/.
